title: HistoryPowerStart
description: Indicates the start of a sequence of events (tag changes) which are chained. Power sequences CAN BE nested! eg: [p1]minion played -> [p1.1]knife jugler triggers -> [p1.1.1]random minion takes damage

entityID.description: Entity triggering this sequence of events

power_type.description: Kind of effect that triggers this chain

effect_source.description: Card identification. The card represents an array of specific effects

effect_index.description: The index to lookup specific effects

effect_target.description: Target entity for the selected effect (`power_type` property)
